title: handwritten Breyton logo - various {Stephen}
content:
\image   
   
or at http:://www.breyton.com ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20100205163724im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Would really appreciate any help finding a decent approximation for this logo. Surely there's a font out there \*somewhere\* that looks almost identical.   
   
Thanks in advance.
author: anonymous

comments.content: Well, thank you. If only they were mine.

You could just have Mr. Breyton sign his name   
again... it's obviously handwritten. Or do them a   
favor and sell them a new mark/logotype.   
   
Good luck.

Scoles,   
   
Those are sweet script fonts you've got there.

It's so blatantly handwritten the   
closest I can come is Carpenter...   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/Testdrive?p=96&s=Breyton&id=76773&submit=display](http://web.archive.org/web/20100205163724/http:/www.myfonts.com/Testdrive?p=96&s=Breyton&id=76773&submit=display)   
   
or Emily Austin...   
 [http://www.typequarry.com/type.html?sku=042&cart=101307018914198](http://web.archive.org/web/20100205163724/http:/www.typequarry.com/type.html?sku=042&cart=101307018914198)   
   
or Texas Hero...   
 [http://www.typequarry.com/type.html?sku=014&cart=101307018914198](http://web.archive.org/web/20100205163724/http:/www.typequarry.com/type.html?sku=014&cart=101307018914198)   
   
Stephen
